content:
Transportation from the airport to Kintamani can be arranged in advance to make your trip more convenient. Here are some options:

1. **Private Car Service**: You can book a private car service with a driver to take you from Ngurah Rai International Airport (DPS) to Kintamani. This is a convenient option, especially if you're traveling with a group or prefer a more personalized service. You can book through companies like Bali Private Car, Kintamani Transport, or Bali Airport Transfer.
2. **Taxi**: Taxis are widely available at the airport, but be prepared to negotiate the fare in advance. You can also use a taxi booking app like Grab or Go-Van to book a ride.
3. **Shuttle Services**: Many hotels and resorts in Kintamani offer shuttle services from the airport. Be sure to check with your accommodation provider if they offer this service.
4. **Public Transportation**: If you're on a budget, you can take a public bus from the airport to Kintamani. This option is more time-consuming and may not be as convenient, but it's a cost-effective way to get to your destination.

When booking a private car service or shuttle, be sure to provide your flight details and accommodation information to ensure a smooth pickup and drop-off.

Regarding your experience with a private car service in Hawaii, it's great that you had a convenient and comfortable experience! You can expect a similar level of service in Bali, especially if you book with a reputable provider.

(As a friendly AI, I don't have personal experiences, but I'm here to provide helpful information and recommendations to make your trip planning easier!)
